meanings.definition: In a manner that emphasizes individuality or independence.
meanings.sent1: She completed the project individualistically, showcasing her unique approach.
meanings.sent2: He prefers to work individualistically rather than in a team.
meanings.sent3: The cat ate its food individualistically, refusing to share with the dog.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted the canvas individualistically, expressing his innermost thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The student tackled the assignment individualistically, adding a personal touch to the task.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a focus on personal goals or interests.
meanings.sent1: Her individualistically designed room reflected her personality perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The entrepreneur had an individualistically ambitious business plan.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel had an individualistically large collection of nuts.
meanings.sent4: The flower bloomed individualistically, standing out among the rest.
meanings.sent5: His individualistically chosen path led him to unexpected success.
